unnormalised: Ek navi maa mhonnun, delivery zalea uprant Ob-Gyn-achea poile bhettivixim mhaka khub dhasti asli. Dr. Meera, Cloudnine Hospital, Bangalore-ant, mhaje bhau-bhainin sangli asli, punn torui, hospital-achea bhetti sodanch maka thodde chintit kortat. Mhaka ugddas asa, "Sogllem sarkhem asa kai? Tanke sarkhe zatat kai? Mhojem postpartum complications astolem?" oxem mhaka dislem.
normalised: ek navi am'ma mhunn, mhaka prasuti zalea uprantchea o-bi-ji-vai-enak yetana bhayan dishtalem. benglurauntlea klauddanain hospittlachea ddokttor mirachi suchouna mhojea bhavojeinne keli, punn tori astana, hospittlak yetana mhaka sadarponnan chintan dishtat. mhaka ugddas asa hanv vichar kortale "soglle sadharan asaa? tanke boren zatele? postparttam komplikeshon zalear?".

unnormalised: Appointment 15/07/2024-ak sokallim 10:30 vorancher tharavleli, lahan Rohan zolmlea uprant sumar so satoddeamni. Velar pavop ek tras aslem, Bangalore traffic-ak lagun. Mhajea ghovak, Suresh-ak, 15 minutam bhonvddun parking mell'lli. Nimannem ami clinic-ant paule ani sadharan forms bhorle, mhojem vozon 65 kg asa mhonnpachem ullekh korun, tem pregnancy-chea adlipekhui 10 kg odik aslem.
normalised: nemnuk pandhra julaichya don hozara ani choivisachea sokallchea dha vaddean tis minuttean tharaili, lahan rohan zolmlea uprant lagbhag so satteamni. benglurauntlea traifikak lagun velar paup chukchem zalem. mhojea ghovak, sureshak pondra minuttam phirlea uprant parking mell'li. nimanne ami klinikak gele ani sadharan form bhore, tech borobor mazem vojn ponchshtt kilogram sangta, jem garbha adlea vojnanim dha kilogram chodd aslem.

unnormalised: Dr. Meera khub dhirachem ani samajik aslem. Tannem mhojim vitals check kelem (BP 120/80 aslem) ani breast-feeding schedule-achem vicharlem. Tannem asllea PPD symptoms-am vixim-ui vicharlem. Mhojem energy-chem level unnem asa mhonnun mhaka dislem punn tem baby-chea sovem nhid naslolya ratrank dilom. Tannem ek multivitamin suchoilem (Pregnacare Max, 1 tab disak ek pavtt) ani mhaka thoddo "me time" ghevnk protsahan dilo.
normalised: ddokttor mira khub sangati ani samajpavpi asli. tinnem maji viktals (bi-pi ek so-i ani vis slash att) pasun janch keli ani dhau pilauchea taimingavixi vicharlem. tinnem p-pi-di lakxannam baddan vicharlem. hanv sanglem mhoji urja kami asta, punn hanv tem balea bhurgeacho nind nasleleo ratichea karannak lagoi. tinnem ek multivitamin (pregnakar maks, ek ttab divasak) suchoile ani mhaka kaim "mi taim" gheunk ut'tejn dilem.

unnormalised: Examination vegim ani dukh naslem. Tannem mhaka utsah dilo ki C-section incision boro zata mhonn ani mhoje pelvic floor muscles bolka korunk kaim exercises-anchem updesh dilem. Ami contraception options-am vixim-ui charcha keli; tannem IUD vo oral pills suchoile. Mhaka khub khatri na konnachea sovem vochonk mhonn, punn atam maka thodi mahiti asa.
normalised: janch vegim ani tras naxilea asli. tinnem mhaka pattekarun sangalem ki si-sekshoncho ghao boren zata ani tinnem mhaka mazechya pelvik floar machyalhank boll divchea khatir kaim vyayam korpak sangalem. ami nirodhanacheo vostuvoixi vicharlem; tinnem ai-yu-di vo mukh pillachi suchovn keli. mhaka khotren tori sangpak zainam punn mhaka kaim mahiti mell'llea.

unnormalised: Sogllo mellun, bhettin mhajeo chintam komi kelio. Dr. Meera, tachem 20+ vorsanchem anubhavachem sovem, mhaka margdarshan korunk asa mhonn zannun ghevnk khub utsahacho aslem. Ghoddie bhurgem zalea uprantui tumkam boro Ob-Gyn sodun kaddop khub mhotvachem. Bangalore-ant konnankui boro ani kallji ghetna doctor sodta, tankam hanv suchoitolem.
normalised: ekundarit, yetanaka mhoji chinta kami zali. mhaka khobor asli ki ddokttor mirak, tichya visam voir vorshanchea anubhavak lagun, mazak margodorshan divpak asa tech borobor mhaka pattekarponn dishtalem. garbha adim ani uprant ekhaddeam borea o-bi-ji-vai-ena sodhun kaddop mhothvachem. benglurauntlea konnakui hanv tichi suchovna kortolem ji ekhadi yogy ani dekhbal korpi ddokttor sodhta.
